Properties

ARFeature * feature

Detailed Description

Abstract superclass for views that display some sort of ARFeature.

Member Function Documentation

- (id) initWithFeature: (ARFeature *)  feature  

Abstract method that initializes the receiver with the given feature. This message may only be sent to subclasses.

Parameters:
feature The feature. May not be nil.
Returns:
The receiver.
- (void) updateWithSpatialState: (ARSpatialState *)  spatialState
usingRelativeAltitude: (BOOL)  useRelativeAltitude
withDistanceFactor: (CGFloat)  distanceFactor 

Updates the position and transform in the EF space using the given spatial state.

+ (id) viewForFeature: (ARFeature *)  feature  

Creates and returns the right type of view for the given feature.

Parameters:
feature The feature. May not be nil.
Returns:
A view, or nil if no suitable view type was found.

Property Documentation

- (ARFeature*) feature [read, assign]

The feature that is displayed in this view.
